attributes.action: Decisions on Tiers to be based on a borough's Covid numbers not a whole county.
attributes.additional_details: Deeply unjust decisions have been made that will have huge financial and social impacts that could be in place for months.
attributes.background: Decide on a Tier based on a borough's Covid numbers not on a county.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562176
